channel.title: Docker - Today I Learnt...
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Today I Learnt...

item.title: How to enable Docker BuildKit in MacOS Docker Desktop
item.description: Since Docker 18.09, you can the BuildKit feature to take advantages of improved performance and extra features when building images â€” see Build images with Buildkit from the Docker docs.

item.title: How to run Jekyll in a Docker container
item.description: To run the server, run: docker run --rm \ --volume="${PWD}:/srv/jekyll" \ -p 4000:4000 \ -it jekyll/jekyll:3.
